gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:17:17: 17.Kandi ye kuzishakira abagore benshi, kugira ngo umutima we udahinduka ukava ku Uwiteka, kandi ye kuzarushaho kwishakira ifeza n’izahabu byinshi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:17:18: 18.Kandi namara kwima ingoma ye aziyandikire aya mategeko mu gitabo, ayakuye mu gifitwe n’abatambyi b’Abalewi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:17:19: 19.Icyo gitabo azakibane ajye agisomamo iminsi yose akiriho, kugira ngo yige kubaha Uwiteka Imana ye, no kwitondera amagambo yose y’ibi byategetswe n’aya mategeko, no kuyumvira,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:17:20: 20.umutima we utishyira hejuru ya bene wabo, adateshuka iburyo cyangwa ibumoso ngo ave muri aya mategeko, ahubwo ngo arame mu bwami bwe we n’urubyaro rwe, hagati mu Bisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:1: Abisirayeli bahanurirwa ko umuhanuzi Mesiya azaturuka muri bo1.Abatambyi b’Abalewi ndetse umuryango wa Lewi wose, ntibagire umugabane cyangwa gakondo mu Bisirayeli, ahubwo barye ku bitambo bitambirwa Uwiteka bigakongorwa n’umuriro, batungwe na gakondo ye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:2: 2.Ntibazagire gakondo muri bene wabo, Uwiteka ni we gakondo yabo nk’uko yababwiye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:3: 3.Uyu ube ari wo uba umwanya w’abatambyi abantu bakwiriye kubakūrira: abatamba igitambo cy’inka cyangwa cy’intama, bajye bakūrira umutambyi urushyi rw’ukuboko n’imisaya n’igifu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:4: 4.Kandi uzajye umuha umuganura w’amasaka yawe n’uwa vino yawe, n’uw’amavuta ya elayo yawe, n’uw’ubwoya bw’intama zawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:5: 5.Kuko ari we Uwiteka Imana yawe yatoranirije mu miryango yawe yose guhagarara, agakora umurimo wera mu izina ry’Uwiteka we n’urubyaro rwe iteka ryose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:6: 6.Kandi Umulewi nava aho atuye, ahantu hose h’iwanyu ho mu gihugu cy’Abisirayeli cyose, akajya ahantu Uwiteka azaba yaratoranije abitewe n’umutima ubyifuza rwose,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:7: 7.azajye akora umurimo wera mu izina ry’Uwiteka Imana ye, nk’uko bene wabo bose b’Abalewi bakora, bahagarara imbere y’Uwiteka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:8: 8.Ajye ahwanya n’abandi umugabane w’ibyokurya, ariko ugeretswe ku biguzi by’ibyarazwe na ba sekuruza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:9: 9.Numara kugera mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha, ntuzige gukurikiza ibizira bikorwa n’ayo mahanga.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:10: 10.Muri mwe ntihazaboneke ucisha umuhungu we cyangwa umukobwa we mu muriro, cyangwa ukora iby’ubupfumu cyangwa uragurisha ibicu, cyangwa umupfumu, cyangwa umurozi,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:11: 11.cyangwa umwambuzi, cyangwa ushikisha, cyangwa uragurira abantu ibizababaho, cyangwa umushitsi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:12: 12.Kuko ukora ibyo wese ari ikizira Uwiteka yanga urunuka, kandi ibyo bizira ni byo bitumye Uwiteka Imana yawe izirukana ayo mahanga imbere yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:13: 13.Utungane rwose ku Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:14: 14.Kuko ayo mahanga uzahindūra yumvira abaragurisha ibicu n’abapfumu, ariko wowe ho Uwiteka Imana yawe ntigukundira kugenza utyo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:15: 15.Uwiteka Imana yawe izabahagurukiriza umuhanuzi umeze nkanjye ukomotse hagati muri mwe, muri bene wanyu, azabe ari we mwumvira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:16: 16.Bizakubera rwose nk’ibyo wasabiye Uwiteka Imana yawe kuri Horebu kuri wa munsi w’iteraniro, uti “Sinkongere kumva ijwi ry’Uwiteka Imana yanjye cyangwa kubona uyu muriro mwinshi, ntazapfa.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:17: 17.Uwiteka arambwira ati “Ibyo bavuze babivuze neza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:18: 18.Nzabahagurukiriza umuhanuzi umeze nkawe ukomotse muri bene wabo, nzashyira amagambo yanjye mu kanwa ke ajye ababwira ibyo mutegetse byose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:19: 19.Kandi utazumvira amagambo yanjye, uwo azavuga mu izina ryanjye, nzabimuhōra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:20: 20.Ariko umuhanuzi uzahangara kwihimbira ijambo ntamutegetse kuvuga akarivuga mu izina ryanjye, cyangwa akavuga mu izina ry’izindi mana, uwo muhanuzi azapfa.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:21: 21.Kandi niwibaza uti “Tuzamenya dute ijambo Uwiteka atavuze?”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:18:22: 22.Umuhanuzi navuga mu izina ry’Uwiteka hanyuma icyo yavuze ntikibe, ntigisohore, icyo kizaba ikitavuzwe n’Uwiteka. Uwo muhanuzi azaba ahangaye kucyihimbira, ntuzamutinye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:1: Imidugudu y’ubuhungiro (Kub 35.9-28; Yos 20.1-9)1.Uwiteka Imana yawe nimara kurimbura amahanga ya ba nyir’igihugu iguha, ukayazungura ugatura mu midugudu yabo no mu mazu yabo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:2: 2.uzirobanurire imidugudu itatu yo hagati mu gihugu cyawe, Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:3: 3.Uziharurire inzira, ugabanye igihugu cyawe Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo mu bice bitatu, kugira ngo uwishe umuntu wese abone uko ahungira muri umwe muri iyo midugudu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:4: 4.Iri ni ryo tegeko rya gatozi wishe umuntu, agahungiramo, akabaho. Uzica mugenzi we atabyitumye adasanzwe amwanga,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:5: 5.nk’uko umuntu yajyana na mugenzi we mu ishyamba guca ibiti, akamanika intorezo, akihanukira kuyikubita ku giti ngo agice, igakuka ikikubita kuri mugenzi we ikamwica, azahungire muri umwe muri iyo midugudu, abeho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:6: 6.Bibere bityo kugira ngo uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye adakurikira gatozi uwo akirakaye, akamufatīra kuko urugendo ari rurerure, akamukubita ikimwicakandi yari adakwiriye kwicwa, kuko adasanzwe amwanga.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:7: 7.Ni cyo gitumye ngutegeka nti “Uzirobanurira imidugudu itatu.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:8: 8.Kandi Uwiteka Imana yawe niyagura urugabano rwawe, nk’uko yarahiye ba sekuruza banyu, akaguha igihugu cyose yarahiye ba sekuruza banyu ko izabaha,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:9: 9.(kandi izakiguha niwitondera aya mategeko yose ukayumvira, ayo ngutegeka uyu munsi ngo ukunde Uwiteka Imana yawe, ugahora ugenda mu nzira ikuyoboye), uziyongerere indi midugudu itatu uyongere kuri ya yindi uko ari itatu,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:10: 10.kugira ngo amaraso y’abatacumuye atavushirizwa hagati mu gihugu cyawe Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo, ukagibwaho n’urubanza rw’ayo maraso.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:11: 11.Ariko umuntu niyanga mugenzi we, akamwubikira akamutera, akamukubita ikimwica agahungira muri umwe muri iyo midugudu
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:12: 12.abakuru bo mu mudugudu w’iwabo bazamutumire, bamukureyo, bamugabize uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye amuhōre.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:13: 13.Ntuzamubabarire ukure ku Bisirayeli amaraso y’utacumuye, kugira ngo ubone ibyiza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:14: 14.Ntuzahine imbago z’urubibi rwa mugenzi wawe zashinzwe n’aba kera, muri gakondo yawe uzahabwa mu gihugu Uwiteka aguha guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:15: 15.Umugabo umwe ntazahagurutswe no gushinja umuntu gukiranirwa cyangwa icyaha uko kiri kose, guhamya kw’abagabo babiri cyangwa batatu azabe ari ko gukomeza ijambo ryose. 1 Tim 5.19; Heb 10.28
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:16: 16.Umugabo w’ibinyoma nahagurutswa no gushinja umuntu icyaha,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:17: 17.ababurana bombi bazahagarare imbere y’Uwiteka, imbere y’abatambyi n’abacamanza bazabaho muri icyo gihe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:18: 18.Abo bacamanza babibaririze cyane, nibabona uwo mugabo ari indarikwa washinje mwene wabo ibinyoma,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:19: 19.muzamushyire aho yashakaga gushyirisha mwene wabo uwo. Uko azabe ari ko mukura ikibi hagati muri mwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:20: 20.Abasigaye bazabyumva batinye, be kongera gukorera ikibi kingana gityo hagati muri mwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:19:21: 21.Ntuzababarire umeze atyo, ubugingo buhōrerwe ubundi, ijisho rihōrerwe irindi, iryinyo rihōrerwe irindi, ikiganza gihōrerwe ikindi, ikirenge gihōrerwe ikindi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:1: Amategeko y’intambara1.Nutabara kurwanya ababisha bawe, ukabona amafarashi n’amagare n’abantu babaruta ubwinshi ntuzabatinye, kuko uri kumwe n’Uwiteka Imana yawe yagukuye mu gihugu cya Egiputa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:2: 2.Kandi nimwigira hafi y’intambara, umutambyi azigire hafi y’abantu
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:3: 3.ababwire ati “Nimwumve Bisirayeli, uyu munsi mwigiye hafi y’ababisha murwanya. Imitima yanyu nticogore, ntimutinye, ntimuhinde umushyitsi, ntimubakukire imitima,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:4: 4.kuko Uwiteka Imana yanyu ari yo ijyana namwe ngo ibarwanire n’ababisha banyu, ibakize.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:5: 5.Kandi abatware bazabaze abantu bati “Ni nde uri hano wubatse inzu akaba atarayeza? Nagende asubire muri iyo nzu ye gupfira mu ntambara, undi ngo ayeze.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:6: 6.Kandi ni nde uri hano wateye uruzabibu akaba atararya imbuto zarwo? Nagende asubire imuhira ye gupfira mu ntambara, undi ngo arye imbuto zarwo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:7: 7.Kandi ni nde uri hano wasabye umukobwa akaba ataramurongora? Nagende asubire imuhira ye gupfira mu ntambara, undi ngo amurongore.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:8: 8.Kandi abatware bongere babaze abantu bati “Ni nde uri hano utinya agacogora umutima? Nagende asubire imuhira, imitima ya bene wabo ye gukuka nk’uwe.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:9: 9.Abatware nibamara kubwira abantu ibyo, bashyireho abatware b’ingabo bo gutabaza abantu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:10: 10.Niwigira hafi y’umudugudu ngo urwane na wo, uzawubwire iby’amahoro.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:11: 11.Maze nibagusubiza iby’amahoro bakakūgururira, abo uzasangamo bose uzabakoreshe uruharo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:12: 12.Ariko nibanga gusezerana amahoro nawe, ahubwo bagashaka kurwana nawe, uzasakize uwo mudugudu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:13: 13.Kandi Uwiteka Imana yawe niwukugabiza, uzicishe umugabo uwurimo wese inkota,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:14: 14.ariko abagore n’abakobwa n’abana bato, n’amatungo n’ibiri muri uwo mudugudu byose, n’iminyago n’isahu byawo byose, ubyijyanire urye ibyo wanyaze ababisha bawe, ibyo Uwiteka Imana yawe yaguhaye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:15: 15.Azabe ari ko ugenza imidugudu ikuri kure cyane, itari iy’aya mahanga.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:16: 16.Ariko mu midugudu y’aya mahanga Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo, ntuzakize ikintu cyose gihumeka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:17: 17.Ahubwo uzarimbure rwose ayo mahanga, ni yo Baheti n’Abamori, n’Abanyakanāni n’Abaferizi, n’Abahivi n’Abayebusi uko Uwiteka Imana yawe yagutegetse,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:18: 18.kugira ngo batabigisha gukurikiza ibizira byabo byose bagirira imana zabo, mukaba mucumuye ku Uwiteka Imana yanyu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:19: 19.Numara igihe kirekire ugose umudugudu ukarwanira kuwutsinda, ntuzatsembeshe intorezo ibiti bya bene wo kuko byagutungisha imbuto zabyo, ntuzabice. Igiti cyo mu murima mbese na cyo ni umuntu byatuma ugitera nka wa mudugudu?
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:20:20: 20.Icyakora ibiti uzi ko bitera imbuto ziribwa, uzabitutira ubitsembeho, ubyubakishe ibihome ku mudugudu ukurwanya ugeza aho uzawutsindira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:1: Andi mategeko1.Mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha guhindūra, nubona intumbi y’uwishwe iri mu gasozi uwamwishe ntamenyekane,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:2: 2.abakuru bawe n’abacamanza bawe bazagende bagere intera ziva aho intumbi y’uwishwe iri, zikagera ku midugudu ihagose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:3: 3.Umudugudu urusha iyindi kuba bugufi bw’iyo ntumbi, abakuru bo muri uwo mudugudu bazazane iriza bakuye mu mashyo batigeze gukoresha, itigeze gufatanywa n’indi ngo ikurure ikintu,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:4: 4.bayimanure mu gikombe kirimo akagezi kadakama, kitahinzwe kitabibwemo, bayivunire ijosi muri icyo gikombe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:5: 5.Abatambyi b’Abalewi bigire hafi, kuko ari bo Uwiteka Imana yawe yatoranirije kuyikorera no guhesha abantu umugisha mu izina ry’Uwiteka, kandi ari bo bakwiriye guca urubanza rw’imburanya zose n’urw’uruguma rwose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:6: 6.Abakuru bose b’uwo mudugudu urushaho kuba bugufi bw’iyo ntumbi, bakarabire hejuru y’iyo nka yavuniwe ijosi muri icyo gikombe
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:7: 7.bavuge bati “Amaboko yacu si yo yavushije ya maraso, kandi n’amaso yacu ntiyayabonye ava.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:8: 8.Uwiteka babarira ubwoko bwawe Abisirayeli wacunguye, ntubare ku bwoko bwawe Abisirayeli amaraso y’utacumuye.” Maze bazaba bahongerewe ayo maraso.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:9: 9.Uko ni ko amaraso y’utacumuye muzayakūza hagati muri mwe, gukora ibyo Uwiteka abona ko ari byiza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:10: 10.Nutabara kurwanya ababisha bawe, Uwiteka Imana yawe ikabakugabiza ukabajyana ari imbohe,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:11: 11.ukabona mu banyagano umukobwa mwiza ukamubenguka, ugashaka kumurongora,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:12: 12.uzamujyane iwawe, yiyogosheshe, ace inzara,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:13: 13.yiyambure imyenda yanyaganywe, agume mu nzu yawe, amaremo ukwezi kutagabanije aborogera se na nyina, nyuma uzabone kumurongora.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:14: 14.Nubona ko utakimwishimira uzamureke ajye aho ashaka, ariko ntuzamugure, ntuzamugirire nk’imbata kuko uzaba umwononnye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:15: 15.Umugabo nagira abagore babiri umwe akaba inkundwakazi undi akaba inyungwakazi, bombi akaba abyaranye na bo, umuhungu w’imfura akaba uw’inyungwakazi,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:16: 16.najya kuraga ntazagire umuhungu w’inkundwakazi umutware ngo amurenze uw’inyungwakazi, kandi ari we mpfura koko.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:17: 17.Ahubwo yemereshe umuhungu w’inyungwakazi ko ari imfura kumuraga imigabane ibiri y’ibyo afite byose, kuko ari we gushobora kubyara kwe kwatangiriyeho, ibikwiriye imfura ni ibye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:18: 18.Umuntu nagira umuhungu unaniranye w’umugome utumvira se na nyina, agakomeza kutabumvira naho bamuhanishije ibihano,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:19: 19.se na nyina bamufate bamushyire abakuru b’umudugudu wabo, mu marembo yawo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:20: 20.Babwire abakuru b’umudugudu wabo bati “Uyu mwana wacu yarananiranye kandi ni umugome, yanga kutwumvira, ni umunyangeso mbi kandi ni umusinzi.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:21: 21.Abagabo bo mu mudugudu wabo bose bamwicishe amabuye, uko azabe ari ko mukura ikibi hagati muri mwe. Abisirayeli bose bazabyumva batinye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:22: 22.Kandi umuntu nakora icyaha gikwiriye kumwicisha bakamwica ukamumanika ku giti,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:21:23: 23.intumbi ye ntizarare kuri icyo giti, ahubwo ntuzareke kumuhamba uwo munsi, kuko umanitswe ku giti ari ikivume ku Mana. Nuko umuhambire kugira ngo utanduza igihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:1: Andi mategeko1.Nubona inka cyangwa intama ya mwene wanyu izimiye, ntuzihugenze ngo udahura na yo, ahubwo ntuzabure kuyigarurira mwene wanyu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:2: 2.Kandi mwene wanyu uwo natakuba bugufi, cyangwa niba tamuzi, uyijyane iwawe uyigumane, ugeze aho mwene wanyu uwo azayishakira uyimuhe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:3: 3.Kandi n’indogobe ye uzayigenze utyo, n’umwambaro we, n’ikindi kintu cyose cya mwene wanyu cyari kizimiye ukakibona, ntukwiriye kwihugenza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:4: 4.Nubona indogobe ya mwene wanyu cyangwa inka ye iguye mu nzira ntuzihugenze, ntuzabure kumufasha kuyigandura.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:5: 5.Umugore cyangwa umukobwa ntakambarane n’umugabo, kandi umugabo ntakambarane n’umugore, kuko ukora atyo wese ari ikizira Uwiteka Imana yawe yanga urunuka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:6: 6.Icyari cy’inyoni nikiba ku nzira imbere yawe, ku giti cyose cyangwa hasi, kirimo ibyana cyangwa amagi, nyina ibundikiye ibyana cyangwa amagi, ntuzajyanane nyina n’ibyana byayo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:7: 7.Ntuzabure kureka nyina ngo igende, ariko ibyana wemererwa kubyijyanira, urekere nyina kugira ngo ubone ibyiza, urame.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:8: 8.Niwubaka inzu uzubake ku gisenge cyayo ikikigota kikarinda umuntu kugwa, kugira ngo umuntu atagwa avuye ku nzu yawe, bikayizanira urubanza rw’amaraso.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:9: 9.Ntuzabibe imbuto z’amoko abiri mu ruzabibu rwawe, kugira ngo utazakwa ibyezemo byose, za mbuto wabibye n’imbuto z’imizabibu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:10: 10.Ntuzahingishe icyuma gikururwa n’inka n’indogobe zifatanije hamwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:11: 11.Ntuzambare umwenda uboheshejwe ikivange cy’ubudodo bw’ubwoya bw’intama n’ubw’imigwegwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:12: 12.Uzatere inshunda ku misozo y’impande enye z’umwenda wambara.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:13: 13.Umuntu narongora umugeni akaryamana na we, akamwanga
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:14: 14.akamurega ibiteye isoni, akamwita izina ribi ati “Narongoye uyu mugeni mwegereye nsanga atagira ibimenyetso byerekana ko ari umwari”,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:15: 15.maze se na nyina b’uwo mukobwa bajyane ibimenyetso by’uko ari umwari, babishyire abakuru b’umudugudu wabo, mu marembo yawo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:16: 16.Se w’uwo mukobwa abwire abakuru ati “Uyu mugabo namushyingiye umukobwa wanjye none aramwanze,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:17: 17.kandi dore amureze ibiteye isoni ati ‘Sinasanganye umukobwa wawe ibimenyetso by’uko ari umwari.’ Ariko ibimenyetso by’ibyo ngibi.” Basase uwo mwenda imbere y’abakuru b’umudugudu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:18: 18.Abakuru b’uwo mudugudu bafate uwo mugabo bamukubite,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:19: 19.bamuce icyiru cya shekeli z’ifeza ijana bazihe se w’uwo mukobwa, bamuhoye yuko yise umwari w’Abisirayeli izina ribi, na we abe umugore we, ntazamwirukane mu gihe akiriho cyose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:20: 20.Ariko icyo kirego niba ari icy’ukuri, uwo mukobwa atabonetseho ibimenyetso by’uko ari umwari,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:21: 21.bamusohore bamujyane ku rugi rw’inzu ya se, abagabo bo mu mudugudu wabo bamwicishe amabuye bamuhōra gukorera ikizira mu Bisirayeli, ni cyo gusambanira kwa se. Uko abe ari ko mukura ikibi hagati muri mwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:22: 22.Umugabo nafatwa asambana n’umugore ufite umugabo bombi babīce, umugabo n’umugore basambanye. Uko abe ari ko ukura ikibi mu Bisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:23: 23.Umugabo nasanga mu mudugudu umwari wasabwe n’undi mugabo akaryamana na we,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:24: 24.bombi muzabajyane mu marembo y’uwo mudugudu mubicishe amabuye. Umukobwa mumwicire kuko atatatse ari mu mudugudu, umugabo mumwicire kuko yononnye muka mugenzi we. Uko abe ari ko mukura ikibi hagati muri mwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:25: 25.Ariko umugabo nasanga mu gasozi umukobwa wasabwe akamufatirayo akamukinda, umugabo wamukinze azabe ari we wicwa wenyine.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:26: 26.Umukobwa ntuzagire icyo umutwara, kuko adakoze icyaha gikwiriye kumwicisha, kuko bimeze nk’uko umuntu atera mugenzi we akamwica.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:27: 27.Uwo mugabo yamusanze mu gasozi, uwo mukobwa wasabwe arataka, ntihagira umutabara.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:28: 28.Umugabo nasanga umwari utarasabwa akamufata, akamukinda bakabafata,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:22:29: 29.uwo mugabo wamukinze ahe se w’uwo mukobwa shekeli z’ifeza mirongo itanu, uwo mukobwa azabe umugore we kuko yamwononnye, ntazamwirukane iminsi yose akiriho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:1: 1.Ntihakagire ucyura muka se, ntakorosore umwenda wa se ngo amwambike ubusa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:2: Andi mategeko2.Umenetse ibinyita bito cyangwa ushahuwe, ntakajye mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:3: 3.Ikibyarwa n’ikinyandaro ntibikajye mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka, ntihakagire uwo mu rubyaro rwabo ujya mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka, kugeza ku buzukuruza babo b’ibihe cumi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:4: 4.Umwamoni cyangwa Umumowabu ntakajye mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka, iteka ntihakagire uwo mu rubyaro rwabo ujya mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka, kugeza ku buzukuruza babo b’ibihe cumi,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:5: 5.kuko batabasanganije ibyokurya n’amazi ubwo mwavaga muri Egiputa, kandi kuko baguriye Balāmu mwene Bewori w’i Petori yo muri Mezopotamiya ngo akuvume.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:6: 6.Ariko Uwiteka Imana yawe yanga kumvira Balāmu, ahubwo Uwiteka Imana yawe iguhindurira umuvumo kuba umugisha, kuko Uwiteka Imana yawe yagukundaga.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:7: 7.Ntuzabashakire amahoro cyangwa ibyiza iminsi yose ukiriho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:8: 8.Ntukange urunuka Umwedomu kuko ari mwene wanyu, ntukange urunuka Umunyegiputa kuko wari umusuhuke mu gihugu cyabo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:9: 9.Abuzukuru babo bazajye mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:10: 10.Nutabara kurwanya ababisha bawe ukagerereza, uzirinde ikibi cyose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:11: 11.Muri mwe nihaba umugabo wahumanijwe n’ibyamubayeho nijoro, azave mu rugerero ye kuhagaruka
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:12: 12.ariko nibujya kwira yiyuhagire, izuba ryamara kurenga akagaruka mu rugerero.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:13: 13.Kandi uzagire ahantu h’inyuma y’urugerero aho muca kwihagarika,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:14: 14.kandi mu bintu byawe uzajyanemo igihōsho, nusohoka ukicara ugicukuze, uhindukire utwikīre aho uhagurutse.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:15: 15.Kuko Uwiteka Imana yawe igendera hagati aho muganditse kugira ngo igukize, ikugabize ababisha bawe bari imbere yawe. Ni cyo gituma aho muganditse hakwiriye kuba ahera itababonamo ikintu cyose giteye isoni, igahindukira ikabavamo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:16: 16.Imbata icitse shebuja ikaguhungiraho ntuzayimusubize.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:17: 17.Ibane namwe hagati muri mwe, aho izatoranya muri umwe mu midugudu yanyu, aho ikunze kuba ntuzayigirire nabi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:18: 18.Ntihazagire maraya mu Bisirayelikazi, ntihazagire utinga abagabo mu Bisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:19: 19.Ntuzajyane igisasūro cya maraya cyangwa ibihembo by’utingwa mu nzu y’Uwiteka Imana yawe ngo uhiguze umuhigo wose, kuko ibyo byombi ari ibizira Uwiteka Imana yawe yanga urunuka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:20: 20.Ntuzaguririze mwene wanyu ku mwaka inyungu, naho yaba iy’ifeza cyangwa iy’ibyokurya, cyangwa iy’ikindi kintu cyose kiguririzwa kubona inyungu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:21: 21.Umunyamahanga wemererwa kumuguririza ku mwaka inyungu, ariko mwene wanyu ntuzamwake inyungu, Uwiteka Imana yawe ibone kuguhera umugisha ibyo ugerageza gukorera byose mu gihugu ujyanwamo no guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:22: 22.Nuhiga Uwiteka Imana yawe umuhigo ntuzatinde kuwuhigura, kuko Uwiteka Imana yawe itazabura kuwukubaza bikakubera icyaha,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:23: 23.ariko niwirinda guhiga ntibizakubera icyaha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:24: 24.Ijambo riva mu kanwa kawe ujye uryitondera urisohoze, numara guhiga Uwiteka Imana yawe umuhigo wahigishijwe n’umutima ukunze, ukawusezeranisha akanwa kawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:25: 25.Nujya mu ruzabibu rwa mwene wanyu, wemererwa kurya inzabibu ugahaga uko ushaka, ariko ntuzagire izo usoromera mu kintu ufite.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:23:26: 26.Nujya mu masaka ya mugenzi wawe agihagaze wemererwa guca amahundo, ariko ntuzatemesha umuhoro imyaka ye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:1: Amategeko yo kwahukana1.Umuntu narongora umugeni maze ntamukundwakaze kuko hari igiteye isoni yamubonyeho, amwandikire urwandiko rwo kumusenda arumuhe, amwirukane mu nzu ye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:2: 2.Namara kuva mu nzu ye, yemererwa kugenda agacyurwa n’undi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:3: 3.Kandi umugabo wamucyuye namunyungwakaza, akamwandikira urwandiko rwo kumusenda akarumuha, akamwirukana mu nzu ye, cyangwa uwo mugabo wamucyuye napfa,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:4: 4.umugabo we wa mbere wabanje kumwirukana ntazamucyure amaze kononekara, kuko ibyo byaba ikizira imbere y’Uwiteka. Kandi ntuzashyire icyaha ku gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:5: 5.Umugabo naba arongoye vuba ntazatabare kandi ntazakoreshwe umurimo wose, amare umwaka iwe aruhutse anezeze umugore yarongoye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:6: 6.Ntihakagire umuntu waka urusyo cyangwa ingasīre ho ingwate, kuko yaba yatse ubugingo bw’umuntu ho ingwate.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:7: 7.Nibabona umuntu wibye uwo muri bene wabo Abisirayeli, akamugira nk’imbata cyangwa akamugura, uwo mujura azicwe. Uko abe ari ko mukura ikibi hagati muri mwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:8: 8.Wite ku muze w’ibibembe, kugira ngo ugire umwete wo kwitondera no kumvira ibyo abatambyi b’Abalewi bazabigisha byose. Ibyo nategetse abo azabe ari byo mwitondera, mwumvira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:9: 9.uhore wibuka ibyo Uwiteka Imana yawe yagiriye Miriyamu mu rugendo ubwo mwavaga muri Egiputa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:10: 10.Nuguriza cyangwa nutiza mugenzi wawe ikintu cyose, ntuzinjizwe mu nzu ye no kwiha ingwate mu bye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:11: 11.Uhagarare hanze, uwo uguriza abe ari we usohokana ingwate ayiguhe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:12: 12.Kandi niba ari umukene ntuzararane ingwate ye,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:13: 13.ntuzabure kuyimusubiza izuba nirirenga, kugira ngo aryame muri uwo mwambaro agusabira umugisha. Ibyo bizakubera gukiranuka imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:14: 14.Ntuzagirire nabi umukozi ukorera ibihembo w’umukene w’umworo, naho yaba uwo muri bene wanyu, cyangwa uwo mu basuhuke b’abanyamahanga bari iwanyu mu gihugu cyanyu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:15: 15.Uzajye umuha ibihembo bye by’umunsi akoze, izuba ntirizarenge utarabimuha, kuko ari umukene akabihoza ku mutima abyifuza, adatakira Uwiteka akakurega, bikakubera icyaha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:16: 16.Ba se b’abana ntibakicwe babahōra abana babo, kandi abana ntibakicwe babahōra ba se, umuntu wese yicishwe n’icye cyaha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:17: 17.Ntuzagoreke urubanza rw’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga cyangwa urw’impfubyi, kandi umwambaro w’umupfakazi ntukawumwake ho ingwate.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:18: 18.Ahubwo ujye wibuka yuko wari umuretwa mu gihugu cya Egiputa, Uwiteka Imana yawe ikagucungura ikagukurayo. Ni cyo gituma nkubuza kugenza utyo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:19: 19.Nusarura umurima wawe ukibagirwa umuganda muri wo, ntuzasubireyo kuwenda, uzabe uw’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga n’uw’impfubyi n’uw’umupfakazi, kugira ngo Uwiteka Imana yawe iguhere umugisha imirimo ukora yose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:20: 20.Nukubitira umwelayo wawe kugusha imbuto zawo, ntuzasubire kwakura amashami yawo ubwa kabiri, izisigaye zizabe iz’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga, n’iz’impfubyi n’iz’umupfakazi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:21: 21.Nusoroma imbuto z’uruzabibu rwawe ntuzasubiremo guhumba, izisigaye zizabe iz’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga, n’iz’impfubyi n’iz’umupfakazi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:24:22: 22.Kandi ujye wibuka yuko wari umuretwa mu gihugu cya Egiputa, ni cyo gitumye ngutegeka kugenza utyo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:1: Andi mategeko1.Nihaba imburanya ku bantu, bakajya kuburana bakabacira urubanza, batsindishirize uwakiranutse, batsindishe uwakoze icyaha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:2: 2.Kandi niba uwo munyabyaha yakoze ibikwiriye kumukubitisha, umucamanza amurambike ategeke ko bamukubitira imbere ye inkoni zihwanye n’icyaha cye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:3: 3.Yemererwa kumukubita inkoni mirongo ine, ntazazirenze kugira ngo mwene wanyu atakubera umunyagisuzuguriro, nibarenza izo bakamukubita inkoni nyinshi zizirenze.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:4: 4.Ntugahambire umunwa w’inka ihonyōra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:5: 5.Abavandimwe nibaba hamwe umwe agapfa adasize impfubyi y’umuhungu, umugore w’uwapfuye ntazashyingirwe ahandi hatari muri bene wabo b’umugabo we, ahubwo umugabo wabo amucyure, amuhungure.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:6: 6.Umuhungu azabanza kubyara azabe ari we uzungurira se wabo wapfuye, kugira ngo izina rye ritazimira mu Bisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:7: 7.Uwo mugabo nadakunda guhungura umugore wabo, uwo mugore ajye mu marembo y’umudugudu abwire abakuru ati “Umugabo wacu yanze gucikura mwene se, ntakunze kumpungura.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:8: 8.Abakuru b’umudugudu wabo bamuhamagaze bamuhane, nadakurwa ku ijambo akavuga ati “Sinshaka kumuhungura”,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:9: 9.umugore wabo amwegerere imbere y’abo bakuru amukweture inkweto, amucire mu maso avuge ati “Uko abe ari ko udacikura mwene se agirirwa.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:10: 10.Izina rye rizahore rivugwa ritya mu Bisirayeli ngo “Inzu y’uwakwetuwe.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:11: 11.Abagabo nibarwana, umugore w’umwe akajya gukiza umugabo we umukubita agasingiriza ukuboko akamukama,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:13: 13.Ntukagire mu isaho yawe ibyuma upimisha indatira imwe biciye ukubiri, ikinini n’igito.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:14: 14.Ntukagire mu nzu yawe ibyibo b’urugero rumwe biciye ukubiri, ikinini n’igito.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:15: 15.Ahubwo icyuma gitunganye kingana rwose n’uko cyitwa abe ari cyo upimisha, icyibo gitunganye kingana rwose n’uko cyitwa abe ari cyo ugeresha, kugira ngo uramire mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:16: 16.Kuko abakora ibimeze nka bya bindi bose, abakora ibidatunganye bose, ari ikizira Uwiteka Imana yawe yanga urunuka.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:17: 17.Uhore wibuka ibyo Abamaleki babagiriye mu rugendo ubwo mwavaga muri Egiputa,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:18: 18.uko babasanganiriraga mu rugendo bakica ab’inyuma banyu, abatakaye inyuma bose b’abanyantegenke ubwo mwananirwaga mukaruha, ntibatinye Imana.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:25:19: 19.Ni cyo gituma Uwiteka Imana yawe nimara kugukiza ababisha bawe bose bakugose, ikaguha kuruhukira mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo ngo ugihindūre, uzaba ukwiriye gukuraho rwose kwibukwa kw’Abamaleki, ngo bibagirane mu bo munsi y’ijuru bose. Ntuzabyibagirwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:1: Amategeko yo kuganura1.Numara kugera mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha ho gakondo, ukagihindūra ukagituramo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:2: 2.uzende ku muganura w’ibyeze mu butaka byose, ibyo uzasarura mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha, ubishyire mu cyibo ubijyane ahantu Uwiteka Imana yawe izaba yaratoranirije kuhashyira izina ryayo ngo rihabe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:3: 3.Usange umutambyi uzaba uriho muri icyo gihe umubwire uti “Uyu munsi neruriye Uwiteka Imana yawe yuko nageze mu gihugu, Uwiteka yarahiye ba sogokuruza ko izaduha.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:4: 4.Uwo mutambyi akwakire cya cyibo agitereke hasi, imbere y’igicaniro cy’Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:5: 5.Nawe uvugire imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe uti “Sogokuruza yari Umwaramu wari bugufi bwo gushiraho, aramanuka ajya muri Egiputa asuhukirayo ari impagu, yororokerayo aberayo ubwoko bukomeye bunini bw’ubunyamaboko menshi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:6: 6.Abanyegiputa batugirira nabi baratubabaza, badukoresha uburetwa bw’agahato
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:7: 7.dutakira Uwiteka Imana ya ba sogokuruza, Uwiteka yumva gutaka kwacu, areba umubabaro wacu n’imiruho yacu n’agahato baduhata.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:8: 8.Uwiteka adukūza muri Egiputa amaboko menshi n’ukuboko kurambutse, n’ibiteye ubwoba bikomeye n’ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:9: 9.Atuzana aha hantu aduha iki gihugu, ari igihugu cy’amata n’ubuki.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:10: 10.None dore nzanye umuganura w’ibyeze mu butaka, ibyo umpaye Uwiteka.” Ubitereke hasi imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe, wikubite imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:11: 11.Wishimane n’Umulewi n’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga uri hagati muri mwe, mwishimire ibyiza byose Uwiteka Imana yawe yaguhanye n’inzu yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:12: 12.Numara kurobanura kimwe mu icumi cy’ibyo wejeje byose mu mwaka wa gatatu, ari wo mwaka wo kurobanura kimwe mu icumi cya byose, uzajye ubiha Umulewi n’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga, n’impfubyi n’umupfakazi kugira ngo barīre iwanyu bahage.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:13: 13.Uvugire imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe uti “Nakuye ibyera byose mu nzu yanjye mbiha Umulewi n’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga, n’impfubyi n’umupfakazi uko amategeko yawe yose wantegetse ari. Sinagize na rimwe ryo muri ayo mategeko yawe ncumura, kandi sinayibagiwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:14: 14.Sinigeze kurya ibyo byera nkirabuye kandi nta byo nabitse ngihumanye, kandi sinabitanze ho ibinyagano, ahubwo numviye Uwiteka Imana yanjye, nitondeye ibyo wantegetse byose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:15: 15.Curika amaso uri mu ijuru ubuturo bwawe bwera, uhāne ubwoko bwawe Abisirayeli umugisha n’ubutaka waduhaye bw’igihugu cy’amata n’ubuki, nk’uko warahiye ba sogokuruza.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:16: 16.Uyu munsi Uwiteka Imana yawe igutegetse kumvira ayo mategeko n’ayo mateka. Nuko ujye ushyira umutima wawe wose n’ubugingo bwawe bwose kuyitondera no kuyumvira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:17: 17.Uyu munsi wasezeranishije Uwiteka kuba Imana yawe, kugira ngo uhore ugenda mu nzira ikuyoboye, witondere amategeko yayo n’ibyo yagutegetse n’amateka yayo, wumvire ibyo ikubwiye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:18: 18.Kandi n’Uwiteka uyu munsi yagusezeranishije kumubera ubwoko yironkeye nk’uko yakubwiye, kandi yuko uzitondera amategeko ye yose
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:26:19: 19.kugira ngo agusumbishe ayandi mahanga yaremye yose, uyarushe gushimwa no kogera no kubahwa, ubere Uwiteka Imana yawe ubwoko bwera nk’uko yavuze.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:1: Ibibuye binini byashinzwe Ebali n’i Gerizimu1.Mose n’abakuru b’Abisirayeli bategeka abantu bati “Muhore mwitondera amategeko yose mbategeka uyu munsi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:2: 2.Kandi ubwo muzambuka Yorodani mukagera mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yanyu ibaha, uzishingire ibibuye binini ubihome ingwa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:3: 3.Uzandike kuri ibyo bibuye amagambo yose y’ayo mategeko, numara kwambutswa no kujya mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha, igihugu cy’amata n’ubuki, nk’uko Uwiteka Imana ya ba sekuruza banyu yagusezeranije.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:4: 4.Nuko nimumara kwambuka Yorodani muzashinge ibyo bibuye mbategetse uyu munsi ku musozi wa Ebali, ubihome ingwa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:5: 5.Kandi uzubakireyo Uwiteka Imana yawe igicaniro cy’amabuye, ntuzayakozeho ikintu cy’icyuma.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:6: 6.Uzubakishe igicaniro cy’Uwiteka Imana yawe amabuye atabajwe, abe ari cyo utambiriraho Uwiteka Imana yawe ibitambo byoswa,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:7: 7.kandi utambireyo ibitambo by’uko muri amahoro ubirīreyo, wishimire imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:8: 8.Uzandike kuri ibyo bibuye amagambo yose y’aya mategeko, wandikishije gukeba inyuguti zisomeka neza.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:9: 9.Mose n’abatambyi b’Abalewi babwira Abisirayeli bose bati “Wa bwoko bw’Abisirayeli we, ceceka wumve: uyu munsi uhindutse ubwoko bw’Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:10: 10.Ni cyo gituma ukwiriye kumvira Uwiteka Imana yawe, ukitondera amategeko y’Uwiteka y’uburyo bwose, ngutegeka uyu munsi.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:11: 11.Mose yihanangiriza abantu kuri uwo munsi ati
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:12: 12.“Aba azabe ari bo bahagarikwa ku musozi wa Gerizimu no kwifuriza abantu umugisha, nimumara kwambuka Yorodani: ab’imiryango ya Simiyoni na Lewi na Yuda, na Isakari na Yosefu na Benyamini.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:13: 13.Kandi aba azabe ari bo bahagarikwa ku musozi wa Ebali no kuvuga umuvumo: ab’imiryango ya Rubeni na Gadi na Asheri, na Zebuluni na Dani na Nafutali.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:14: 14.Abalewi babwize Abisirayeli bose ijwi rirenga bati
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:15: 15.“Nihagira umuntu urema igishushanyo kibajwe cyangwa kiyagijwe, ikizira Uwiteka yanga urunuka, kiremwa n’umuhanga wabyo akagishinga rwihishwa, avumwe.” Abantu bose babasubize bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:16: 16.Abalewi bati “Usuzugura se cyangwa nyina avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:17: 17.Abalewi bati “Uhina imbago z’urubibi rwa mugenzi we avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:18: 18.Abalewi bati “Uyobya impumyi inzira avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:19: 19.Abalewi bati “Ugoreka urubanza rw’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga, cyangwa rw’impfubyi cyangwa rw’umupfakazi, avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:20: 20.Abalewi bati “Usambana na muka se avumwe, kuko aba yorosoye umwenda wa se akamwambika ubusa.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:21: 21.Abalewi bati “Uryamana n’itungo ryose avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:22: 22.Abalewi bati “Usambana na mushiki we basangiye se cyangwa nyina, avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:23: 23.Abalewi bati “Usambana na nyirabukwe avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:24: 24.Abalewi bati “Uwica mugenzi we rwihishwa avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:25: 25.Abalewi bati “Uwenda ibiguzi byo kwicisha utacumuye avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:27:26: 26.Abalewi bati “Udasohoza amagambo y’ayo mategeko ngo ayumvire, avumwe.” Abantu bose bavuge bati “Amen!”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:1: 1.Nugira umwete wo kumvira Uwiteka Imana yawe, n’uwo kwitondera amategeko yayo yose ngutegeka uyu munsi, Uwiteka Imana yawe izagusumbisha amahanga yose yo mu isi,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:2: 2.kandi iyi migisha yose izakuzaho, ikugereho niwumvira Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:3: 3.Uzagirira umugisha mu mudugudu, uzawugirira no mu mirima.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:4: 4.Hazagira umugisha imbuto zo mu nda yawe, n’imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe, n’imbuto z’amatungo yawe, kororoka kw’inka zawe n’ukw’imikumbi yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:5: 5.Hazagira umugisha igitenga cyawe n’icyibo uvugiramo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:6: 6.Uzagira umugisha mu majya no mu maza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:7: 7.Uwiteka azatuma ababisha bawe baguhagurukiye banesherezwa imbere yawe, bazaca mu nzira imwe bagusanganiye, baguhunge baciye mu nzira ndwi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:8: 8.Uwiteka azategeka umugisha kuba mu bigega byawe no mu byo ugerageza gukora byose, kandi azaguhera umugisha mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:9: 9.Uwiteka azagukomereza kumubera ubwoko bwera nk’uko yakurahiye, niwitondera amategeko y’Uwiteka Imana yawe, ukagenda mu nzira ikuyoboye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:10: 10.Amahanga yo mu isi yose azabona yuko witiriwe izina ry’Uwiteka, agutinye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:11: 11.Kandi Uwiteka azakugwiriza ibyiza by’imbuto zo mu nda yawe, n’iby’iz’amatungo yawe, n’iby’imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe, mu gihugu Uwiteka yarahiye ba sekuruza banyu yuko azaguha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:12: 12.Uwiteka azagukingurira ijuru, ububiko bwe bwiza ngo ajye akuvubira imvura mu bihe byayo, ahe umugisha imirimo ikuva mu maboko yose. Uzaguriza amahanga menshi, maze ntuzayaguzaho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:13: 13.Uwiteka azaguhindura umutwe ntazaguhindura umurizo, uzaba hejuru gusa ntuzaba hasi, niwumvira amategeko y’Uwiteka Imana yawe ngutegeka uyu munsi ukayitondera,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:14: 14.ntuteshuke iburyo cyangwa ibumoso ngo uve mu byo ngutegeka uyu munsi byose, uhindukirire izindi mana uzikorere.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:15: 15.Ariko nutumvira Uwiteka Imana yawe, ngo witondere amategeko yayo y’uburyo bwose ngutegeka uyu munsi, iyi mivumo yose izakuzaho, ikugereho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:16: 16.Uzaba ikivume mu mudugudu, uzaba ikivume mu mirima.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:17: 17.Hazavumwa igitenga cyawe n’icyibo uvugiramo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:18: 18.Hazavumwa imbuto zo mu nda yawe, n’imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe, no kororoka kw’inka zawe n’ukw’imikumbi yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:19: 19.Uzavumwa mu majya no mu maza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:20: 20.Uwiteka azakoherereza umuvumo no guhagarikwa umutima no kubwirwa ibyago bizaza, mu byo ugerageza gukora byose kugeza aho uzarimbukira ukamarwa vuba, aguhōra ibyaha bikomeye uzaba ukoze byo kumwimūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:21: 21.Uwiteka azaguteza mugiga itakuvaho ageze aho azagutsembera, ugashira mu gihugu ujyanwamo no guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:22: 22.Uwiteka azaguteza urusogobo n’ubuganga, n’ububyimba bwaka umuriro, n’icyokere cyinshi n’amapfa, no kuma n’uruhumbu, bizakomeka bigeze aho uzarimbukira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:23: 23.Ijuru ryo hejuru y’umutwe wawe rizahinduka umuringa, n’ubutaka uhagazeho buzahinduke icyuma.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:24: 24.Mu cyimbo cy’imvura Uwiteka azasuka mu gihugu cyawe umukungugu, n’umusenyi muto nk’ifu y’ingezi, bizava mu ijuru bikugweho bigeze aho uzarimbukira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:25: 25.Uwiteka azatuma uneshwa n’ababisha bawe bagushyire imbere, uzaca mu nzira imwe ubasanganiye ubahunge uciye mu nzira ndwi, uzateraganwa mu bihugu by’abami bo mu isi bose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:26: 26.Uzaba inyama z’ibisiga byose n’inyamaswa zose, ntihazagira ubyirukana.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:27: 27.Uwiteka azaguteza ibishyute nk’iby’Abanyegiputa, no kuzana amagara n’ubuheri n’ibikoko, we kubivurwa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:28: 28.Uwiteka azaguteza ibisazi n’ubuhumyi n’ubuhungete,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:29: 29.uzakabakaba ku manywa y’ihangu nk’uko impumyi ikabakabira mu mwijima, ntuzagira ukuboko kwiza mu byo ukora, uzajya ugirirwa inabi nsa kandi unyagwe iteka he kugira ugutabara.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:30: 30.Uzasaba umugeni harongore undi, uzubaka inzu we kuyitahamo, uzatera uruzabibu we kurya imbuto zarwo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:31: 31.Inka yawe izabagirwa mu maso yawe we kuyiryaho, indogobe yawe izanyagirwa mu maso yawe we kuyikomorerwa, intama zawe zizahabwa ababisha bawe he kugira ugutabara.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:32: 32.Abahungu bawe n’abakobwa bawe bazahabwa irindi shyanga, amaso yawe azabireba ahereyo ananizwe no kubakumbura umunsi ukira, nta cyo uzashobora gukora.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:33: 33.Imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe n’ibyakuvuye mu maboko byose bizaribwa n’ishyanga utazi, uzagirirwa inabi nsa ushenjagurwe iteka,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:34: 34.bitume usazwa n’ibyo amaso yawe azibonera.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:35: 35.Uwiteka azaguteza imikerēve ikomeye cyane mu mavi, n’ibishyute bikomeye cyane ku maguru we kubivurwa, ndetse azabiguteza bihēre mu bworo bw’ikirenge bigeze mu gitwariro.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:36: 36.Wowe n’umwami uziyimikira, Uwiteka azabashyira ishyanga utigeze kumenya wowe na ba sekuruza banyu, kandi uzakorererayo izindi mana z’ibiti n’amabuye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:37: 37.Kandi uzahindukira amahanga yose Uwiteka azakwimuriramo igitangaza, n’iciro ry’imigani n’agashinyaguro.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:38: 38.Uzasohora imbuto nyinshi usarure bike kuko inzige zizabirya.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:39: 39.Uzatera inzabibu uzihingire ariko ntuzanywa vino yazo, ntuzasoroma imbuto zazo kuko inanda zizazirya.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:40: 40.Uzagira imyelayo mu gihugu cyawe cyose ariko ntuzisiga amavuta yayo, kuko imyelayo yawe izahungura imiteja.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:41: 41.Uzabyara abahungu n’abakobwa be kuba abawe, kuko bazajyanwa ho iminyago.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:42: 42.Ibiti byawe byose n’imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe inzige zizabyigabiza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:43: 43.Umunyamahanga uri hagati muri mwe azajya yunguka kugusumba, nawe uzahora usubira hasi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:44: 44.Azakuguriza nawe we kumuguriza, ni we uzaba umutwe nawe ube umurizo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:45: 45.Kandi iyo mivumo yose izakuzaho, izagukurikira igufatīre igeze aho uzarimbukira, kuko uzaba utumviye Uwiteka Imana yawe ngo witondere amategeko y’uburyo bwose yagutegetse.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:46: 46.Iyo mivumo izakuberaho kuba ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza, kandi izaba ku rubyaro rwawe iteka ryose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:47: 47.Ubutunzi bw’ibintu byose bugusagiranye, ntibwaguteye gukorera Uwiteka Imana yawe n’ibyishimo n’umunezero w’umutima,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:48: 48.ni cyo kizatuma ukorera ababisha bawe Uwiteka azaguhagurukiriza, ufite inzara n’inyota no kwambara ubusa n’ubukene bwa byose, kandi azashyira ku rutugu rwawe umutwaro w’uburetwa uremereye, udakurwaho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:49: 49.Uwiteka azakuzanira ishyanga rya kure akuye ku mpera y’isi, riza nk’uko ikizu kiguruka, ishyanga uzaba utazi ururimi rwaryo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:50: 50.ishyanga rifite mu maso hagaragaza urugomo, ritazubaha abashaje, ritazababarira abana.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:51: 51.Bazarya abana b’amatungo yawe, n’imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe bageze aho uzarimbukira, kandi ntibazagusigira imyaka y’impeke cyangwa vino cyangwa amavuta ya elayo, cyangwa kororoka kw’inka zawe cyangwa ukw’imikumbi yawe, bageze aho bazakurimburira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:52: 52.Bazagota imidugudu yawe yose, kugeza aho inkike z’amabuye zawe ndende zikomeye wiringiraga zo mu gihugu cyawe cyose zizaridukira. Bazasakiza imidugudu yawe yose yo mu gihugu cyawe cyose, Uwiteka Imana yawe izaba yaraguhaye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:53: 53.Uzarya imbuto zo mu nda yawe, inyama z’abahungu bawe n’abakobwa bawe, Uwiteka Imana yawe izaba yaraguhaye ku bwo kugotwa no gusakizwa, ababisha bawe bazagusakiza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:54: 54.Umugabo wo muri mwe wadamaraye akarushaho kumenyera kugubwa neza gusa, azarebana imbabazi nke mwene se n’umugore aseguye n’abana be asigaranye bakiriho,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:55: 55.ye guha n’umwe muri bo ku nyama z’abana be azaba ariye, kuko ari nta cyo asigaranye ku bwo kugotwa no gusakizwa, ababisha bawe bazagusakiza mu midugudu yawe yose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:56: 56.Umugore wo muri mwe wadamaraye akamenyera kugubwa neza gusa, utatinyuka no gukandagiza ikirenge ku bwo kudamarara no kumenyera kugubwa neza gusa, azarebana imbabazi nke umugabo aseguye n’umuhungu we n’umukobwa we,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:57: 57.ngo atabagaburira ku ngobyi iturutse hagati y’amaguru ye no ku bana be abyaye, kuko azabarīra rwihishwa kuko abuze byose ku bwo kugotwa no gusakizwa, ababisha bawe bazagusakiza mu midugudu yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:58: 58.Nutitondera amagambo yose y’aya mategeko yanditswe muri iki gitabo, ngo utinye iri zina ry’icyubahiro riteye ubwoba, ari ryo UWITEKA IMANA YAWE,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:59: 59.Uwiteka azaguteza wowe n’urubyaro rwawe, ibyago by’uburyo butangaza bikomeye bizakubaho akōme, n’indwara zikomeye zibabere akarande.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:60: 60.Kandi azaguteza nawe za ndwara zose yateje Abanyegiputa zikagutera ubwoba, zigufateho akaramata.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:61: 61.Kandi indwara yose n’icyago cyose bitanditswe mu gitabo cy’aya mategeko, na byo Uwiteka azabiguteza ageze aho uzarimbukira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:62: 62.Muzasigara muri bake, nubwo mwari muhwanije ubwinshi n’inyenyeri zo ku ijuru, kuko uzaba utumviye Uwiteka Imana yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:63: 63.Kandi nk’uko Uwiteka yishimiraga kubagirira neza no kubagwiza, ni ko Uwiteka azishimira kubarimbura no kubatsemba kandi muzajahurwa mukurwe mu gihugu mujyanwamo no guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:64: 64.Kandi Uwiteka azabatataniriza mu mahanga yose, uhereye ku mpera y’isi ukageza ku yindi mpera yayo, kandi uzakorererayo izindi mana utigeze kumenya, na ba sekuruza banyu batigeze kumenya, z’ibiti n’amabuye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:65: 65.Kandi muri ayo mahanga nta mahoro uzabona, ntuzabona aho uruhurira ibirenge byawe. Ariko Uwiteka azaguherayo umutima uhinda umushyitsi, n’amaso aremba n’umutima wonze.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:66: 66.Uzashidikanya ubugingo bwawe, uzahora utinya ku manywa na nijoro, ntuzagira ikikwiringiza ubugingo bwawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:67: 67.Buzacya ugira uti “Iyo bwira”, buzagoroba ugira uti “Iyo bucya”, ubitewe n’ubwoba bwo mu mutima wawe bugutinyisha, n’ibyo amaso yawe azibonera.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:68: 68.Kandi Uwiteka azagusubirisha muri Egiputa inkuge, mu nzira nakubwiye nti “Ntuzongera kuyibona ukundi.” Muzigurirayo n’ababisha banyu ngo mube imbāta z’abagabo n’abagore, mwe kubona ubagura.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:28:69: Isezerano Imana yagiranye n’Abisirayeli i Mowabu69.Aya ni yo magambo y’isezerano, Uwiteka yategetse Mose gusezeranira n’Abisirayeli mu gihugu cy’i Mowabu, yongewe ku isezerano yasezeraniye na bo kuri Horebu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:1: 1.Mose ahamagara Abisirayeli bose arababwira ati “Mwabonye ibyo Uwiteka yagiririye Farawo, n’abagaragu be bose n’igihugu cye cyose mu maso yanyu mu gihugu cya Egiputa,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:2: 2.ibigerageresho bikomeye n’ibimenyetso na bya bitangaza bikomeye, amaso yanyu yiboneye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:3: 3.Ariko Uwiteka ntabaha umutima umenya n’amaso areba n’amatwi yumva, ageza kuri uyu munsi.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:4: 4.Kandi Uwiteka ati “Namaze imyaka mirongo ine mbashorerera mu butayu, imyambaro yanyu ntībasaziyeho, inkweto zanyu ntizasaziye mu birenge byanyu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:5: 5.Ntimurye umutsima, ntimunywe vino cyangwa igisindisha, kugira ngo mumenye yuko ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:6: 6.Mugeze aha hantu, Sihoni umwami w’i Heshiboni na Ogi umwami w’i Bashani badusanganirira kuturwanya turabatsinda,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:7: 7.duhindūra ibihugu byabo tubiha ho gakondo Abarubeni n’Abagadi, n’igice kingana n’ikindi cy’umuryango w’Abamanase.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:8: 8.Nuko mwitondere amagambo y’iri sezerano muyumvire, mubone uko mugira ukuboko kwiza mu byo mukora byose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:9: 9.Uyu munsi mwese muhagaze imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yanyu: abatware banyu b’imiryango n’abakuru banyu, n’abatware b’ingabo banyu n’abagabo b’Abisirayeli bose,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:10: 10.n’abana banyu bato n’abagore banyu, n’umunyamahanga uri hagati mu ngando zanyu, uhereye ku mushenyi w’inkwi zawe ukageza ku muvomyi wawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:11: 11.Muzanywe no kwemera isezerano ry’Uwiteka Imana yawe, isezerano rikomezwa n’indahiro, Uwiteka Imana yawe isezeranira nawe uyu munsi
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:12: 12.kugira ngo igukomereze kuyibera ubwoko, na yo ngo ikubere Imana nk’uko yakubwiye, kandi nk’uko yarahiye ba sekuruza banyu, Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:13: 13.Kandi si mwe mwenyine nsezeranishiriza iri sezerano n’iyi ndahiro,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:14: 14.ahubwo ndisezeraniye abahagararanye natwe uyu munsi imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yacu, kandi n’abatari hano hamwe natwe uyu munsi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:15: 15.Muzi uko twabaga mu gihugu cya Egiputa, kandi uko twaciye hagati y’amahanga mwaciyemo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:16: 16.kandi mwabonye ibizira bakunda, n’ibigirwamana byabo by’ibiti n’amabuye n’ifeza n’izahabu, byari muri bo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:17: 17.Muri mwe he kugira umugabo cyangwa umugore, cyangwa inzu cyangwa umuryango, umutima we uteshuka uyu munsi ngo uve ku Uwiteka Imana yacu, agende akorere ibigirwamana by’ayo mahanga, he kuba muri mwe umuzi wera icyishi n’igisharira cyane.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:18: 18.He kugira uwumvise amagambo ya wa muvumo ngo yirarire mu mutima we ati “Nzagira amahoro nubwo ngendana umutima unangiye”, akarimbuza abahehereye n’abumye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:19: 19.Uwiteka ntazemera kumubabarira, ahubwo uburakari bw’Uwiteka n’ifuhe rye bizagurumanira uwo muntu kuri icyo gihe, imivumo yose yanditswe muri iki gitabo imubeho, kandi Uwiteka azatsemba izina ry’uwo arikure munsi y’ijuru.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:20: 20.Uwiteka azamurobanurira mu miryango y’Abisirayeli yose, kugira ibyago bihwanye n’imivumo yose yo mu isezerano ryanditswe muri iki gitabo cy’amategeko.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:21: 21.Nuko urubyaro rwanyu ruzakurikiraho, abana banyu bazakura babakurikiye, n’umunyamahanga uzava mu gihugu cya kure, nibabona ibyago byabaye muri icyo gihugu n’indwara Uwiteka yagiteje,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:22: 22.kandi yuko icyo gihugu cyose ari amazuku n’umunyu n’ururimbi, kidahingwa, kitera, kitameramo akatsi, gihwanye na kwa gutsembwa kw’i Sodomu n’i Gomora, na Adima n’i Seboyimu Uwiteka yatsembesheje uburakari bwe n’umujinya we,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:23: 23.bo n’amahanga yose bazabaza bati “Ni iki cyatumye Uwiteka agira iki gihugu atya? Umujinya ugurumana utya watewe n’iki?”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:24: 24.Abantu bazabasubiza bati “Ni uko baretse isezerano ry’Uwiteka Imana ya ba sekuruza, iryo yasezeranye na bo ubwo yabakuraga mu gihugu cya Egiputa,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:25: 25.bakagenda bagakorera izindi mana bakazikubita imbere, imana bari batazi kandi Uwiteka yari atazibahaye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:26: 26.Ni cyo cyatumye uburakari bw’Uwiteka bugurumanira iki gihugu, bakakizanira imivumo yose yanditswe muri iki gitabo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:27: 27.Ni cyo cyatumye Uwiteka aterwa n’uburakari n’umujinya, no kurakara kwinshi kubarandura mu gihugu cyabo akabajugunya mu kindi, nk’uko biri none.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:29:28: 28.Ibihishwe ni iby’Uwiteka Imana yacu, ariko ibyahishuwe ni ibyacu n’urubyaro rwacu iteka, kugira ngo twumvire amagambo yose y’aya mategeko.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:1: 1.Ibyo byose nibimara kukubaho, umugisha n’umuvumo nagushyize imbere ukabyibukira mu mahanga yose Uwiteka Imana yawe izaba yarakwirukaniyemo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:2: 2.ukagarukira Uwiteka Imana yawe ukayumvira, ugakora ibyo ngutegetse uyu munsi byose wowe n’abana bawe, ubikoresha umutima wawe wose n’ubugingo bwawe bwose,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:3: 3.Uwiteka Imana yawe izagarura abawe bajyanywe ari imbohe, ikubabarire, isubire guteranya abawe ibakuye mu mahanga yose Uwiteka Imana yawe izaba yarabatatanirijemo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:4: 4.Niba abirukanywe bawe bazaba ku mpera y’isi, ni ho Uwiteka Imana yanyu izabakura ngo ibateranye, ni ho izabatarura.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:5: 5.Kandi Uwiteka Imana yawe izagusubiza mu gihugu ba sekuruza banyu bari baragize gakondo ukigire gakondo, kandi izakugirira neza, izakugwiza urute ba sekuruza banyu ubwinshi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:6: 6.Kandi ibyo mu mutima wawe no mu y’urubyaro rwawe bituma iba nk’imibiri itakebwe, Uwiteka Imana yawe izabikuriramo kugira ngo ukundishe Uwiteka Imana yawe umutima wawe wose n’ubugingo bwawe bwose, ubone uko ubaho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:7: 7.Kandi Uwiteka Imana yawe izashyira iyo mivumo yose ku babisha bawe no ku banzi bawe, bazaba bakugiriye nabi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:8: 8.Nawe uzahindukirire Uwiteka umwumvire, witondere amategeko ye yose ngutegetse uyu munsi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:9: 9.Kandi Uwiteka Imana yawe izakugwiriza ibyiza by’ibikuva mu maboko byose, n’iby’imbuto zo mu nda yawe, n’iby’iz’amatungo yawe, n’iby’imyaka yo ku butaka bwawe, kuko Uwiteka azongera kwishimira kukugirira neza nk’uko yishimiraga ba sekuruza banyu,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:10: 10.niba uzaba wumviye Uwiteka Imana yawe, ukitondera amategeko ye y’uburyo bwose yanditswe muri iki gitabo cy’amategeko, niba uzaba uhindukiriye Uwiteka Imana yawe, uyishakisha umutima wawe wose n’ubugingo bwawe bwose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:11: 11.Kuko ayo mategeko ngutegetse uyu munsi atari ayo kukunanira, kandi atari aya kure ngo utayageraho.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:12: 12.Ntari mu ijuru ngo ubaze uti “Ni nde uri butuzamukire mu ijuru ngo ayatuzanire, ayatwumvishe tuyumvire?”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:13: 13.Kandi ntari hakurya y’inyanja ngo ubaze uti “Ni nde uri butwambukire inyanja ngo ayatuzanire, ayatwumvishe tuyumvire?”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:14: 14.Ahubwo iryo jambo rikuri bugufi cyane, riri mu kanwa kawe no mu mutima wawe ngo uryumvire.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:15: 15.Dore uyu munsi ngushyize imbere ubugingo n’ibyiza, n’urupfu n’ibibi,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:16: 16.kuko ngutegeka uyu munsi gukunda Uwiteka Imana yawe no kugenda mu nzira ikuyoboye, no kwitondera ibyo yategetse n’amategeko yayo n’amateka yayo kugira ngo ubeho, ugwire, Uwiteka Imana yawe iguhere umugisha mu gihugu ujyanwamo no guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:17: 17.Ariko umutima wawe nuteshuka ntuyumvire, ukoshywa, ukikubita imbere y’izindi mana ukazikorera,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:18: 18.uyu munsi ndababwira yuko muzarimbuka, ntimuramire mu gihugu mwambuka Yorodani mujyanwamo no guhindūra.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:19: 19.Uyu munsi ntanze ijuru n’isi ho abahamya bazabashinja, yuko ngushyize imbere ubugingo n’urupfu, n’umugisha n’umuvumo. Nuko uhitemo ubugingo, ubone kubaho wowe n’urubyaro rwawe,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:30:20: 20.ukunde Uwiteka Imana yawe uyumvire, uyifatanyeho akaramata kuko ari yo bugingo bwawe no kurama kwawe, kugira ngo ubone kuba mu gihugu Uwiteka yarahiye ba sekuruza banyu, Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo ko azabaha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:1: Mose asezera ku batambyi no kuri Yosuwa1.Mose arongera abwira Abisirayeli bose aya magambo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:2: 2.Arababwira ati “Uyu munsi maze imyaka ijana na makumyabiri mvutse, singishobora gutambagira. Ndetse Uwiteka yarambwiye ati ‘Ntuzambuka Yorodani iyi.’
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:3: 3.Uwiteka Imana yanyu ubwayo izambuka ibagiye imbere, irimbure ayo mahanga abari imbere, uyahindūre. Yosuwa ni we uzambuka abagiye imbere nk’uko Uwiteka yavuze.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:4: 4.Kandi Uwiteka azayagirira nk’uko yagiriye Sihoni na Ogi, abami b’Abamori n’ibihugu byabo, abo yarimbuye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:5: 5.Uwiteka azayabagabiza, namwe muzayagirire ibyo nabategetse byose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:6: 6.Mukomere mushikame ntimubatinye, ntimubakukire imitima kuko Uwiteka Imana yawe ubwayo izakujya imbere, ntizagusiga ntizaguhāna.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:7: 7.Mose ahamagara Yosuwa amubwirira imbere y’Abisirayeli bose ati “Komera ushikame, kuko uzajyana n’aba bantu mu gihugu Uwiteka yarahiye ba sekuruza ko azabaha, nawe uzakibahesha ho gakondo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:8: 8.Uwiteka ubwe azakujya imbere, azabana nawe ntazagusiga, ntazaguhāna. Ntutinye, ntukuke umutima.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:9: 9.Mose yandika ayo mategeko, ayaha abatambyi b’Abalewi baremērwa isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka, n’abakuru b’Abisirayeli bose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:10: 10.Mose arabategeka ati “Uko imyaka irindwi ishize, mu gihe cyashyizweho cy’umwaka wo guhara, mu minsi mikuru y’ingando,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:11: 11.Abisirayeli bose bazanywe no kubonekera imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yawe ahantu izaba yaratoranije, uzajye usomera aya mategeko imbere y’Abisirayeli bose bayumve.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:12: 12.Uzajye uteranya abantu, abagabo n’abagore n’abana bato, n’umusuhuke w’umunyamahanga uri iwanyu kugira ngo bayumve, bayige bubahe Uwiteka Imana yanyu, bitondere amagambo yose y’aya mategeko bayumvire,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:13: 13.no kugira ngo abana babo batigeze kuyamenya bayumve, bige guhora bubaha Uwiteka Imana yanyu, igihe cyose muri mu gihugu mwambuka Yorodani mujyanwamo no guhindūra.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:14: 14.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Dore igihe cyawe cyo gupfa kigeze bugufi. Hamagara Yosuwa mwiyerekane mu ihema ry’ibonaniro, mbone kumwihanangiriza.” Mose na Yosuwa baragenda, biyerekana mu ihema ry’ibonaniro.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:15: 15.Uwiteka abonekera muri iryo hema ari mu nkingi y’igicu, iyo nkingi ihagarara hejuru y’umuryango w’iryo hema.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:16: 16.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Dore ugiye gusinzirana na ba sekuruza banyu. Aba bantu bazahaguruka bararikire izindi mana, ari byo bigirwamana by’igihugu aho bazajya gutura muri bene cyo, bandeke, bice isezerano ryanjye nasezeranye na bo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:17: 17.Maze icyo gihe bazikongerezaho uburakari bwanjye nanjye mbareke, mbime amaso, batsembwe, bagibweho n’ibyago byinshi n’imibabaro myinshi. Muri icyo gihe bazabaza bati ‘Igituma ibi byago bituzaho si uko Imana yacu itari muri twe?’
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:18: 18.Icyo gihe nzabima amaso nta kabuza, mbahōre ibyaha byose bazaba bakoze byo guhindukirira izindi mana.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:19: 19.“Nuko none mwandike iyi ndirimbo uyigishe Abisirayeli, uyibatoreze kugira ngo iyi ndirimbo imbere umuhamya ushinja Abisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:20: 20.Kuko bazahindukirira izindi mana bakazikorera, bakansuzugura bakica isezerano ryanjye, nimara kubajyana mu gihugu cy’amata n’ubuki narahiye ba sekuruza ko nzabaha, bakamara kurya no guhaga no kubyibuha.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:21: 21.Kandi nibamara kugibwaho n’ibyago byinshi n’imibabaro myinshi, iyi ndirimbo izaba umugabo uhamiriza imbere yabo, kuko itazibagirana ngo ive mu kanwa k’urubyaro rwabo. Nzi ibyo mu mitima yabo biyerekana na none, ntarabajyana mu gihugu narahiye ko nzabaha.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:22: 22.Kuri uwo munsi Mose yandika iyi ndirimbo, ayigisha Abisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:23: 23.Kandi Uwiteka yihanangiriza Yosuwa mwene Nuni ati “Komera ushikame, kuko uzajyana Abisirayeli mu gihugu narahiye ko nzabaha, nanjye nzabana nawe.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:24: 24.Mose amaze kwandika amagambo y’ayo mategeko mu gitabo, ayarangije
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:25: 25.ategeka Abalewi baremērwa isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka ati
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:26: 26.“Nimwende iki gitabo cy’amategeko, mugishyire iruhande rw’isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka Imana yanyu, kibereyo kuba umuhamya ubashinja
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:27: 27.kuko nzi ubugome bwanyu n’uko mutagonda amajosi. Ubwo mugomera Uwiteka nkiriho, nkiri kumwe namwe muri iki gihe, ntimuzarushaho nimara gupfa?
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:28: 28.Munteranirize abakuru b’imiryango yanyu bose n’abatware banyu, kugira ngo mvugire aya magambo mu matwi yabo, ntange ijuru n’isi ho abahamya bazabashinja,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:29: 29.kuko nzi yuko nimara gupfa muziyonona rwose, mugateshuka mukava mu nzira nabategetse. Kandi ibyago bizababaho mu gihe cya nyuma, kuko muzakora icyo Uwiteka abona ko ari kibi, ngo mumurakarishe ibiremwa n’intoki zanyu.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:31:30: 30.Mose avugira mu matwi y’iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose amagambo y’iyi ndirimbo, ageza aho yayarangirije.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:1: Indirimbo ya Mose1.Tega ugutwi wa juru we, nanjye ndavuga, Isi na yo yumve amagambo amva mu kanwa.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:2: 2.Kwigisha kwanjye kuragwa nk’imvura, Amagambo yanjye aratonda nk’ikime. Nk’uko imvura y’urujojo rugwa ku byatsi bitoto, Nk’uko ibitonyanga bigwa ku byatsi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:3: 3.Kuko ngiye kogeza izina ry’Uwiteka, Mwaturire Imana yacu ko ifite icyubahiro gikomeye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:4: 4.Icyo Gitare umurimo wacyo uratunganye rwose, Ingeso zacyo zose ni izo gukiranuka. Ni Imana y’inyamurava itarimo gukiranirwa, Ica imanza zitabera, iratunganye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:5: 5.Bariyononnye ntibakiri abana bayo, Ahubwo ni ikizinga kuri bo, Ni ab’igihe kinaniranye kigoramye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:6: 6.Mwa bwoko bw’abapfapfa mwe, Mwa bwoko bw’abanyabwenge buke mwe, Uko ni ko mwitura Uwiteka? Si we so wagucunguye? Yarakuremye aragukomeza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:7: 7.Ibuka ibihe bya kera, Tekereza imyaka y’ibihe byinshi bya ba sekuruza banyu. Baza so arabikumenyesha, Baza abakuru bo muri mwe barabikubwira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:8: 8.Ubwo Isumbabyose yahaga amahanga gakondo zayo, Igatandukanya amoko y’abantu, Yashyizeho ingabano z’amahanga, Nk’uko umubare w’Abisirayeli uri.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:9: 9.Kuko ubwoko bw’Uwiteka ari bwo gakondo ye, Aba Yakobo ari bo mugabane w’umwandu we.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:10: 10.Ubwo bwoko yabubonye mu gihugu kidaturwamo, Mu butayu butarimo abantu iwabo w’inyamaswa zihūma, Arabugota arabukuyakuya, Aburinda nk’imboni y’ijisho rye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:11: 11.Nk’uko ikizu gikangura ibyana byacyo, Kigahungiriza amababa hejuru yabyo, Kigatanda amababa kikabijyana, Kikabiheka ku mababa yacyo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:12: 12.Ni ko Uwiteka yari umuyobora wabwo wenyine, Nta mana y’inyamahanga yari kumwe na bwo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:13: 13.Yarabuzamuye ibutambagiza mu mpinga z’imisozi yo mu isi, Burya umwero wo mu mirima, Abuha kunyunyuza ubuki bwo mu rutare, N’amavuta ya elayo yo mu gitare kirushaho gukomera,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:14: 14.N’amata y’inka n’amatāmatāma. Abuha ibinure by’abana b’intama, N’amapfizi y’intama y’i Bashani n’ihene, N’ingano zihunze zirushaho kuba nziza, Nk’uko urugimbu rwo ku mpyiko rumeze, Wanyoye vino yenzwe mu maraso y’inzabibu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:15: 15.Maze Yeshuruni arabyibuha atera umugeri, Urabyibushye, urahonjotse, urarembekereye. Maze areka Imana yamuremye, Asuzugura Igitare cy’agakiza ke.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:16: 16.Bamuteye gufuhira imana z’inyamahanga, Bamurakarishije ibizira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:17: 17.Batambiye abadayimoni batari Imana nyakuri, Batambiye imana batigeze kumenya, Imana nshya z’inzaduka, Izo ba sekuruza banyu batatinyaga.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:18: 18.Igitare wavutseho ntukicyibuka, Wibagiwe Imana yakubyaye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:19: 19.Uwiteka yarabibonye bimwangisha urunuka, Abahungu be n’abakobwa be bamurakaje.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:20: 20.Aravuga ati “Nzabima amaso, Nzareba iherezo ryabo uko rizamera, Kuko ari ab’igihe kigoramye cyane, Ari abana batarimo umurava.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:21: 21.Bo banteje gufuhira ikitari Imana nyakuri, Bandakarishije ibigirwamana byabo by’ubusa, Nanjye nzabateza ishyari ku batari ishyanga ry’ukuri, Nzabarakarisha gukunda ishyanga ritagira ubwenge.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:22: 22.Kuko uburakari bwanjye bucanye umuriro, Ukaka ukagera ikuzimu ko hasi, Ugakongorana isi n’umwero wayo, Ugakongeza imerero ry’imisozi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:23: 23.“Nzabarundaho ibyago, Nzabamariraho imyambi yanjye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:24: 24.Bazananurwa n’inzara, Bazamarwa no kugurumana umuriro na mugiga ikaze. Nzabagabiza amenyo y’inyamaswa, N’ubusagwe bw’ibikururuka mu mukungugu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:25: 25.Hanze bazagirirwayo incike n’inkota, No mu mazu bazazigirirwamo n’ibiteye ubwoba, Bizica umusore n’umwari, Umwana wonka n’umusaza umeze imvi.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:26: 26.Naravuze nti ‘Mba mbatatanije ngo bajye kure, Nkabatera kutacyibukwa mu bantu.’
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:27: 27.Iyo ntatinya ibitutsi by’ababisha, Kandi ko abanzi babo bajijwa, Bakavuga bati ‘Amaboko yacu ni menshi, Uwiteka si we wakoze ibyo byose.’ ”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:28: 28.Ubwo ni ubwoko butabasha kwigīra inama, Butarimo ubwenge na buke.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:29: 29.Iyo baba abanyabwenge baba bamenye ibi, Baba bitaye ku iherezo ryabo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:30: 30.Umwe yabashije ate kwirukana igihumbi cyabo, Babiri babashije bate kunesha abantu babo inzovu, Iyo Igitare cyabo kitabagura, Iyo Uwiteka atabagabiza?
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:31: 31.Kuko igitare cya ba bandi kidahwanye n’Icyacu, Nubwo ababisha bacu ubwabo ari bo baca urubanza rw’ibyo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:32: 32.Uruzabibu rwabo rwaturutse ku rw’i Sodomu no mu mirima y’i Gomora, Inzabibu zabo ni amabamba, Amaseri yazo arasharira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:33: 33.Vino yabo ni ubusagwe bw’ibiyoka, Ni ubusagwe bukaze bw’impiri.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:34: 34.“Ibyo ntibibitswe aho ndi? Ntibishyizwe mu bubiko bw’ubutunzi bwanjye, Bukingishijwe igishyizweho ikimenyetso?
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:35: 35.Guhōra no kwitura ni ibyanjye, Ubwo ibirenge byabo bizadandabirana. Kuko umunsi w’ibyago byabo uri bugufi, Kandi ibigiye kubazaho bizatebuka.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:36: 36.Kuko Uwiteka azacira urubanza ubwoko bwe, Azababarira abagaragu be, Nabona yuko amaboko yabo ashize, Kandi ko hatagira usigaye w’imbata cyangwa uw’umudendezo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:37: 37.Azabaza ati “Imana zabo ziri he, Igitare bahungiragaho?
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:38: 38.Imana ziri he zaryaga urugimbu rw’ibitambo byabo, Zikanywa vino y’amaturo yabo y’ibyokunywa? Nizihaguruke zitabare mwebwe, Zibakingire zibarinde.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:39: 39.“Nuko mumenye yuko jyewe, jye ubwanjye ari jye Mana, Kandi yuko nta yindi mana ifatanya nanjye. Ni jye wica, ni jye utanga ubugingo, Nakomerekeje ni jye ukiza, Nta wubasha gukiza uwo mfashe mu kuboko kwanjye.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:40: 40.Kuko manika ukuboko kwanjye nkagutunga mu ijuru, Nkarahira nti ‘Nk’uko ari ukuri yuko mporaho iteka ryose,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:41: 41.Uko ntyaje inkota yanjye irabagirana, Ukuboko kwanjye kugafata amateka. Nzahōra ababisha banjye, Nzitura abanyanga.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:42: 42.Inkota yanjye izarya inyama, Nzasindisha imyambi yanjye amaraso, Amaraso y’abishwe n’ay’abafashwe mpiri, N’ay’imitwe y’abatware b’ababisha.’ ”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:43: 43.Banyamahanga mwishimane n’ubwoko bwayo, Kuko izahōrera amaraso y’abagaragu bayo, Igahōra ababisha bayo, Kandi izahongerera igihugu cyayo n’ubwoko bwayo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:44: 44.Mose araza avugira amagambo yose y’iyo ndirimbo mu matwi y’abantu, afatanije na Yosuwa mwene Nuni.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:45: 45.Mose arangije kubwira Abisirayeli bose ayo magambo yose
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:46: 46.arababwira ati “Mushyire imitima yanyu ku magambo yose mbahamirije uyu munsi, muzayategekere abana banyu kugira ngo bitondere amagambo yose y’ayo mategeko, bayumvire,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:47: 47.kuko kuyitondera atari icyoroheje kuri mwe, ahubwo ari cyo bugingo bwanyu, kandi ari cyo kizabahesha kuramira mu gihugu mwambuka Yorodani mujyanwamo no guhindūra.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:48: 48.Uwo munsi Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:49: 49.“Zamuka uyu musozi wa Nebo wo mu misozi ya Abarimu, uri mu gihugu cy’i Mowabu ahateganye n’i Yeriko, witēgere igihugu cy’i Kanāni mpa Abisirayeli ho gakondo,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:50: 50.upfire kuri uwo musozi uzamutse, usange ubwoko bwawe nk’uko Aroni mwene so yapfiriye ku musozi Hori, agasanga ubwoko bwe,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:51: 51.kuko mwancumuriyeho hagati mu Bisirayeli ku mazi y’i Meriba y’i Kadeshi yo mu butayu bwa Zini, ntimwerekanire kwera kwanjye hagati mu Bisirayeli.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:32:52: 52.Uzitēgere igihugu kikuri imbere, ariko ntuzajya muri icyo gihugu mpa Abisirayeli.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:1: Mose asabira imiryango y’Abisirayeli umugisha1.Uyu ni wo mugisha Mose umuntu w’Imana, yahesheje Abisirayeli agiye gupfa
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:2: 2.ati “Uwiteka yaturutse kuri Sinayi, Yabarasiye atungutse kuri Seyiri, Yabaviriye atungutse ku musozi wa Parani, Ava hagati mu bera inzovu nyinshi, Iburyo bwe haturuka umuriro w’amategeko ye, arawuboherereza.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:3: 3.Ni ukuri akunda amahanga, Abera be bose bari mu kuboko kwawe, Bicaye imbere y’ibirenge byawe, Umuntu wese wo muri bo azemera amagambo yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:4: 4.Mose yadutegetse amategeko, Ni yo gakondo y’iteraniro ry’Abayakobo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:5: 5.Yari umwami mu ba Yeshuruni, Ubwo abatware b’ubwoko n’imiryango y’Abisirayeli yose, Bateraniraga hamwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:6: 6.“Rubeni abeho ye gupfa, Ariko abantu be babe bake.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:7: 7.Ibi ni byo yavuze kuri Yuda: “Uwiteka umva ijwi rya Yuda, Umujyane mu bwoko bwe. Amaboko ye yaramurwaniye, Nawe umubera umutabazi, umufasha kurwanya ababisha be.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:8: 8.Kuri Lewi aravuga ati “Tumimu zawe na Urimu zawe zifitwe n’umukunzi wawe, Uwo wageragereje i Masa, Uwo wagishirije impaka ku mazi y’i Meriba.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:9: 9.Lewi yavuze se na nyina ati ‘Sinigeze kubabona’. Ntiyemera na bene se, Ntiyamenya abana be ubwe. Koko Abalewi bitondera ijambo ryawe, Bakomeza isezerano ryawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:10: 10.Bazigisha Abayakobo amateka yawe, Bazigisha Abisirayeli amategeko yawe. Bazakunukiriza imibavu, Bazashyira ibitambo byo koswa bitagabanije ku gicaniro cyawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:11: 11.Uwiteka ujye uha umugisha ubutunzi bwe, Ujye wemera umurimo w’amaboko ye. Ujye uhinguranya urukenyerero rw’abamuhagurukiye, N’urw’abamwanga kugira ngo batongera kubyuka.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:12: 12.Kuri Benyamini aravuga ati “Ukundwa n’Uwiteka azabana na we amahoro, Ahora amukingira umunsi ukīra, Aba mu bitugu bye.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:13: 13.Kuri Yosefu aravuga ati “Igihugu cye gihabwe umugisha n’Uwiteka, W’iby’igiciro cyinshi byo mu ijuru n’uw’ikime, N’uw’amazi y’ikuzimu adendeje hasi y’ubutaka,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:14: 14.N’uw’imyaka y’igiciro cyinshi yezwa n’izuba, N’uw’imyaka y’igiciro cyinshi iboneka uko kwezi gutashye,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:15: 15.N’uw’ibirushaho kuba byiza biva mu misozi yahoze na kera, N’uw’iby’igiciro cyinshi biva mu misozi ihoraho,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:16: 16.N’uw’iby’igiciro cyinshi byo mu isi n’ibiyuzuye, N’uw’ubuntu bw’Iyabaga muri cya gihuru cy’amahwa. Umugisha ugwe ku mutwe wa Yosefu, Mu izingiro ry’umutware wa bene se.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:17: 17.Ikimasa cye cy’uburiza icyubahiro ni icyacyo, Gifite amahembe nk’ay’imbogo. Kizayicisha amahanga yose kigeze ku mpera y’isi. Ayo mahembe ni abantu inzovu nyinshi ba Efurayimu, Ayo ni ibihumbi bya Manase.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:18: 18.Kuri Zebuluni aravuga ati “Zebuluni, wishimira amagenda yawe, Isakari, wishimira amahema yawe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:19: 19.Bazahamagara amahanga aze ku musozi, Aho ni ho bazatambira ibitambo by’abakiranutsi, Kuko bazanyunyuza ibintu byinshi biva ku nyanja nyinshi, N’ubutunzi bwahishwe mu musenyi.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:20: 20.Kuri Gadi aravuga ati “Hahirwe uwāgura Gadi. Aryama nk’intare y’ingore, Atanyagura ukuboko n’izingiro ry’umutwe.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:21: 21.Yitoranirije igihugu ho umugabane kimeze nk’umuganura, Kuko ari ho gakondo y’uwategetse amategeko ihishwe. Yagiye ubwoko imbere, Asohoza amateka y’Uwiteka N’ibyo yategetse ku Bisirayeli.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:22: 22.Kuri Dani aravuga ati “Dani ni icyana cy’intare, Gisimbuka kivuye i Bashani.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:23: 23.Kuri Nafutali aravuga ati “Nafutali, uhaze ibyo waherewe ubuntu, Wuzuye imigisha y’Uwiteka, Hindūra igihugu cy’iburengerazuba n’icy’ikusi.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:24: 24.Kuri Asheri aravuga ati “Asheri ahabwe umugisha w’urubyaro, Ashimwe na bene se, Yinike ikirenge mu mavuta ya elayo.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:25: 25.Ibihindizo byawe bizaba ibyuma n’imiringa, Kandi uko iminsi yawe ingana, Ni ko intege zawe zizangana.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:26: 26.“Yeshuruni, nta wuhwanye n’Imana, Izanwa no kugutabara ihetswe n’ijuru, Izana gukomera, ihetswe n’ibicu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:27: 27.Imana ihoraho ni ubuturo bwawe, Amaboko ye iteka ryose arakuramira. Yirukanye ababisha imbere yawe, Iravuga iti ‘Rimbura.’
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:28: 28.Kandi Abisirayeli babe amahoro, Isōko ya Yakobo ibe ukwayo, Mu gihugu cya vino n’imyaka y’impeke, Ijuru ryacyo ritondeshe ikime.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:33:29: 29.Wa bwoko bw’Abisirayeli we, urahiriwe. Ni nde uhwanije nawe kuba ubwoko bwakijijwe n’Uwiteka, Ari we ngabo igukingira ikagutabara, Ari we nkota igutera icyubahiro? Ababisha bawe uzabahindūra bagushyeshye, Ukandagire mu mpinga z’imisozi yabo.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:1: Urupfu rwa Mose1.Mose ava mu kibaya cy’i Mowabu kinini, azamuka umusozi wa Nebo agera mu mpinga ya Pisiga, iteganye n’i Yeriko. Uwiteka amwereka igihugu cy’i Galeyadi cyose ageza i Dani,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:2: 2.n’icy’Abanafutali cyose, n’icy’Abefurayimu n’Abamanase, n’icy’Abayuda cyose ageza ku Nyanja y’iburengerazuba.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:3: 3.Amwereka n’i Negebu, n’ikibaya cyo kuri Yorodani, ari cyo gikombe cy’i Yeriko, umudugudu w’imikindo ageza i Sowari.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:4: 4.Uwiteka aramubwira ati “Ngikiriya igihugu narahiye Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo nti ‘Nzagiha urubyaro rwawe.’ None nguhaye kukirebesha amaso, ariko ntuzambuka ngo ukijyemo.”
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:5: 5.Nuko Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka apfira aho ngaho mu gihugu cy’i Mowabu, uko Uwiteka yategetse.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:6: 6.Amuhamba mu gikombe cyo mu gihugu cy’i Mowabu giteganye n’i Betipewori, ariko nta wuzi igituro cye na bugingo n’ubu.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:7: 7.Mose yapfuye amaze imyaka ijana na makumyabiri avutse, ijisho rye ritabaye ibirorirori, intege ze zari zitagabanutse.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:8: 8.Abisirayeli bamara iminsi mirongo itatu bariririra Mose mu kibaya cy’i Mowabu kinini, nuko iminsi yo kuririra Mose no kumwiraburira irashira.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:9: 9.Yosuwa mwene Nuni yari yuzuye umwuka w’ubwenge, kuko Mose yari yaramurambitseho ibiganza. Abisirayeli baramwumvira, bagenza uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:10: 10.Mu Bisirayeli ntihabonetse ukundi umuhanuzi uhwanye na Mose, uwo Uwiteka yamenyaga barebana.
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:11: 11.Ntawagereranywa na we, ku bw’ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza byose Uwiteka yamutumye gukorera mu gihugu cya Egiputa, ngo abigirire Farawo n’abagaragu be bose n’igihugu cye cyose,
gutegeka_kwa_kabiri:34:12: 12.no ku bw’iby’amaboko menshi byose n’ibiteye ubwoba byose, Mose yakoreye mu maso y’Abisirayeli bose.
